xumm.open-app: Open the Xumm app on your phone.
xumm.change-settings: Go to settings and choose a testnet node.
xumm.scan-qr: Scan this QR code with the Xumm app.

statuses.check-push: Check a push notification on your mobile.
statuses.check-app: Please follow instructions in the Xumm app.
statuses.expired: The QR code is expired, request a new one.

confirm.nft-accept-offer: I admit that Bithomp gives me access to a decentralised marketplace, and it cannot verify or guarantee the authenticity and legitimacy of any NFTs. I confirm that I've read the <1>Terms and conditions</1>, and I agree with all the terms to buy, sell or use any NFTs on Bithomp.
confirm.nft-create-sell-offer: I understand, once my listing is signed, the NFT can be purchased instantly.

cookie.we-use-cookie: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our site.

home.title: XRP Explorer | Scan the XRP Ledger
home.description: XRP price chart | Statistics | NFT explorer | Wallet address look up
home.search-placeholder: Search by XRPL Address / Transaction / NFT / Username / PayString / Offer / Currency hash

whales.header: The most significant transactions for the last 24 hours

ledger.past-ledgers: View transactions in the previous ledgers
ledger.no-transactions: We could not find any transactions to show.

nft-statistics.text0:
The information is a bit outdated, we need to catch up with <1>{{lag}} ledgers.
The data is provided for the ledger #{{crawlerIndex}}, ({{crawlerTime}}).
The last validated ledger is #{{currentLedgerIndex}}, ({{currentLedgerTime}}).
nft-statistics.only-xrp: Can be sold only for XRP

validators.text0:
The validator list <1>{{url}} has sequence {{sequence}} and expiration on {{expiration}}.
It includes {{validatorCount}} validators which are listed below.

error.address-invalid: Please enter a valid XRPL address.

address-hosted.hosted: Entered address is hosted {{serviceName}}, you can register usernames only for non-hosted wallets (hardware wallets, Xumm, etc). If you are an exchange operator, please contact us.

error.address-done: The address already has a registered username.
error.username-empty: Please enter username you want to register.
error.username-invalid: Username should be shorter than 18 characters, no symbols allowed.
error.username-reserved: The username {{username}} is reserved, contact our support.
error.username-hold: The username {{username}} is on hold for registration by another XRPL account. You can try again in 24 hours.
error.agree-terms-page: Please agree to the terms and conditions specified on this page.
error.agree-terms-site: Please agree to the website's terms and conditions.
error.agree-privacy-policy: Please agree to our Privacy Policy.
error.payment-partly: Please send the rest of the amount, so far we only received {{received}} {{currency}} when {{required}} {{currency}} is required.

step0.text0: Bithomp <1>username</1> is a <3>public</3> username for your XRPL address.
step0.text1: The username will be assosiated with your address on the bithomp explorer and in third-party services which use bithomp <1>API</1>. After the registration it will become public - <3>anyone</3> will be able to see it. Your XRPL address will be accessable by:
step0.text2: The username <1>can not be changed or deleted</1>.
step0.only-one-for-address: For each XRPL address you can register only one username.
step0.address-you-control: You can only register usernames for XRPL addresses you control (you have a secret or recovery 12/24 words). You can not register a username for a hosted address (which has a destination tag) within an exchange / service / wallet.
step0.pay-from-your-address: To prove that you're in control of the XRPL address you will need to make a payment from that address (for which you want to assign a username). Payments from other addresses will be counted as donations and won't be refunded.
step0.text3: The payment is for 100 Swedish kronor denominated in XRP. The payment for the username is <1>not refundable</1>. If you pay more than requested, the exceeding amount will be counted as donation and won't be refunded.
step0.text4: Usernames are now used cross-chain, <1>register a username on the XRPL mainnet</1> and it will be available on bithomp dev explorers (within 1 hour).
step0.enter-username: Enter the username you would like to have
step0.enter-country: Your country of residence (for our accounting)
step0.agree-terms-page: I understand and agree to the terms and conditions specified above.
step0.agree-terms-site: I agree with the <1>Terms and conditions</1>.
step0.already-registered: You account already have a registered username
step0.sign-out-to-register-another-one: <0>Sign out</0> from this account to register a username for a different address.

step1.from-your-address: You need to make a payment from the address:
step1.text0: Payments made by you <1>from any other addresses</1> or with a <3>wrong destination tag</3> won't be accepted for the service, it will be accepted as a donation and <5>won't be refunded</5>.
step1.about-confirmation: You will see a confirmation as soon as we receive your payment.

step2.text0: Congratulations! Your username <1>{{ username }}</1> has been succesfully registered.

alerts.text0: Get notified when XRP/USD or XRP/BTC market price by <1>Bitstamp</1> changes for more than 5% within an hour or more than 10% within a day.
alerts.text1: Follow the Telegram channel: <1>bithomp</1> or the twitter account: <3>bithompAlerts</3>.

genesis.text0: The ledger <1>32570</1> is the earliest ledger available, approximately the first week of XRPL history, <3>ledgers 1 through 32569 were lost due to a mishap in 2012</3>.
genesis.ledger-continue: Because the XRP Ledger's state is recorded in every ledger version, the ledger can continue without the missing history.

developer.description: Project description and API use details:
developer.text0: The request won't be approved:<1/>- if you use your private email<3/>- if you want to use API for something that our API doesn't support<5/>- if you want to use it for something that already supported by <7>xrpl.js</7>.
developer.success: Thank you. Your should receive your api token by email within 48 hours.

error.email-invalid: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
error.description-empty: Please add a description of your project.
error.description-invalid: Please write a detailed description of your project.

customer-support.text0: Bithomp is an explorer of the <1>public</1> XRP Ledger.
customer-support.no-help: We can not freeze accounts, make refunds, cancel transactions or change/add destination tags. We do not do investigations and we can not help you to recover your lost or stolen funds.
customer-support.text1: If you funds were stolen or if you became a victim of fraud/scam you can report it <1>here</1>.
customer-support.status-failed: If your transaction has a status "failed" but your funds were taken from your balance then contact the service / wallet / exchange which you used to make this transaction.
customer-support.status-success: If your transaction has a status "success" but it wasn't received then contact the recipient's wallet / service / exchange support.
customer-support.wrong-tag: If you sent a transaction without a destination tag or with a wrong destination tag then read (2) and (3) above.
customer-support.text2: If you're missing 10 XRP in your wallet, please read about the <1>base reserve</1>.
customer-support.paper-wallet: If you want to send XRP from a paper wallet, you need to import it to a software wallet first, you can use Xumm mobile app for that (import secret as a "family seed").
customer-support.flare: If you have a question about "Flare" you need to address it to the Flare community.
customer-support.text3: If you have a <1>partnership or marketing</1> proposals then you can contact us by email: <3/>. You can also contact us with questions about the bithomp username registration or bithomp transaction explorer.
customer-support.no-answer: Due to our limited time we do not answer to emails related to 1-7.
customer-support.submit-info: Submit information about your XRPL service
customer-support.text4: If you have a public XRPL service and you want your XRP addresses to be recognised on Bithomp submit your information <1>here</1>. You can also contact us by email: <3/> if you want to speed up the process.

press: This is the official logo for Bithomp to use by media and press professionals for print and web (svg, png, eps, pdf, for dark and light backgrounds). For media inquiries, please <1>contact us</1>.

page-not-found.text: Click <1>here</1> to check our landing page.

error.Network Error: It seems there is no internet connection ;(
error.Request failed with status code 429: You are sending us too many requests, try later!

error-api.Token information is not found: We couldn't find any information for that ID

text-status.NFT is not owned by the seller account: NFT is not owned by seller
text-status.Unable to verify balance of the buyer ac: Unable to verify balance of the buyer account
text-status.Insufficient funds on the buyer account: The buyer does not have enough funds
text-status.Seller has no trustline for the token or: Seller has no trustline for the token or it can not be verified

explorer.enter-address: Enter an XRPL address or a username
explorer.searching-tx-nft-nftoffer: Searching for Tx / NFT ID / NFT Offer

nft-offers.owned-desc: Here you can search for Buy and Sell Offers for NFTs, type in the XRPL address or username to see what it offers.
nft-offers.for-owned-nfts-desc: Here you can search for Buy Offers for NFTs owned by account, type in the XRPL address or username to see received offers.
nft-offers.privately-offered-to-address-desc: Here you can search for Offers privately created for an account (with destination), it is often used for NFT transfers (price 0 XRP), type in the XRPL address or username to see received offers.
nft-offers.no-nft-offers: We couldn't find any NFT Offers.

nft-offer.desc: Here you can search for NFT Offers, enter an Offer ID and press the search button.

nfts.desc: Here you can search for NFTs, type in the XRPL address to see what NFTs it owns.
nfts.no-nfts: We couldn't find any NFTs with your search parameters.
nfts.load-more: We are looking for data on the XRPL... please wait...
nfts.end: Here are all the NFTs we could find.

nft.desc: Here you can search for NFTs, enter an NFT ID and press the search button.

nft-distribution.desc: Here you can check the distribution of NFTs of a particilar NFT issuer. Enter the NFT issuer XRPL address or a username and press the search button.
nft-distribution.no-nfts: We couldn't find any NFTs issued by that address.

brokers.not-a-marketplace-list: This is not a list of XRPL marketplaces, it is the list of broker accounts. Marketplaces can use different models (without broker transactions), some of them can use mixed models, where only some of their volume goes through the brokerage. If a marketplace stoped using the brokerage model, it will have volume in All time, but not in the last Day or Week.
brokers.text0: XRPL had {{allSales}} NFT trades for {{allVolume}}, from which {{brokerSales}} ({{percentBrokerSales}}) of trades for {{brokerVolume}} ({{percentBrokerVolume}}) were through the brokerage model.

nft-sales.load-more: We are looking for data on the XRPL... please wait...

links.active-offers-same-account: View active offers from that account

donate.help-us: Help us in our mission to make the most user friendly XRPL explorer.
donate.it-helps: Your donation will help us to add capacity and continue to develop Bithomp.
